channel.title: Need a command help
channel.description:
There's a command I had back when I was working on 317s. It was ::getid - say for instance you'd type "::getid torva", and in the chatbox a few lines of text would come up showing you all item ids related to torva.
I need the command for it. I'm making a 634 spawn pk server, and it'd be lots of help if players knew what they were looking for. Thanks in advance! - Chazion

item.title: Need a command help
item.dc:creator: @NotLikingThis NotLikingThis
item.description:
@NotLikingThis wrote:

I don’t work with 634’s so I have no idea what the command would look like but if I had an idea of what yours did look like I probably could convert it myself bur as I said I don’t work with them.

Read full topic

@chazion wrote:

Thanks anyways, couldn’t convert the 317 to 634.

Read full topic

item.title: Need a command help
item.dc:creator: @NotLikingThis NotLikingThis
item.description:
@NotLikingThis wrote:

Here is my command and no you would not need to put in any item id’s…

if(playerCommand.startsWith("getid")) { String a[] = playerCommand.split(" "); String name = ""; int results = 0; for(int i = 1; i < a.length; i++) name = name + a[i]+ " "; name = name.substring(0, name.length()-1); c.sendMessage("Searching: " + name); for (int j = 0; j < Server.itemHandler.ItemList.length; j++) { if (Server.itemHandler.ItemList[j] != null) if (Server.itemHandler.ItemList[j].itemName.replace("_", " ").toLowerCase().contains(name.toLowerCase())) { c.sendMessage("" + Server.itemHandler.ItemList[j].itemName.replace("_", " ") + " - " + Server.itemHandler.ItemList[j].itemId); results++; } } c.sendMessage(results + " results found..."); }
This is for 317 PI just to let you know.(Not sure what your using)

Read full topic
